name: BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend
description: The second entry in the critically acclaimed BlazBlue franchise, BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend adds a number of game play modes, story scenarios, new moves, and an all-new playable character to further enhance the BlazBlue experience and solidify its status as one of the all-time great 2D fighters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 7900 GT or better / AMD Radeon X1900 / nVidia GeForce GT 620 (Windows 8.1) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i5 / i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or better / AMD Radeon HD3700 / nVidia GeForce GT 650 (Windows 8.1) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
